mapper.sql: id as id , university_id as universityId , major_id as majorId , year as year , batch as batch , admissionBatchId as admissionBatchId , university_major_type as universityMajorType , plan_enrolling_number as planEnrollingNumber , real_enrolling_number as realEnrollingNumber , length_of_schooling as lengthOfSchooling , school_fee as schoolFee , highest_score as highestScore , highest_precedence as highestPrecedence , lowest_score as lowestScore , lowest_precedence as lowestPrecedence , average_score as averageScore , average_precedence as averagePrecedence , createDate as createDate , creator as creator , lastModDate as lastModDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , is_delete as isDelete, areaId as areaId
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_university_major_enrolling ( university_id, major_id, year, batch, admissionBatchId, university_major_type, plan_enrolling_number, real_enrolling_number, length_of_schooling, school_fee, highest_score, highest_precedence, lowest_score, lowest_precedence, average_score, average_precedence, createDate, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, is_delete, areaId ) VALUES ( #{universityId}, #{majorId}, #{year}, #{batch}, #{admissionBatchId}, #{universityMajorType}, #{planEnrollingNumber}, #{realEnrollingNumber}, #{lengthOfSchooling}, #{schoolFee}, #{highestScore}, #{highestPrecedence}, #{lowestScore}, #{lowestPrecedence}, #{averageScore}, #{averagePrecedence}, #{createDate}, #{creator}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{isDelete}, #{areaId} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_university_major_enrolling
university_id = #{universityId},
major_id = #{majorId},
year = #{year},
batch = #{batch},
admissionBatchId = #{admissionBatchId},
university_major_type = #{universityMajorType},
plan_enrolling_number = #{planEnrollingNumber},
real_enrolling_number = #{realEnrollingNumber},
length_of_schooling = #{lengthOfSchooling},
school_fee = #{schoolFee},
highest_score = #{highestScore},
highest_precedence = #{highestPrecedence},
lowest_score = #{lowestScore},
lowest_precedence = #{lowestPrecedence},
average_score = #{averageScore},
average_precedence = #{averagePrecedence},
createDate = #{createDate},
creator = #{creator},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
is_delete = #{areaId},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_university_major_enrolling
university_id = #{map.universityId},
major_id = #{map.majorId},
year = #{map.year},
batch = #{map.batch},
admissionBatchId = #{map.admissionBatchId},
university_major_type = #{map.universityMajorType},
plan_enrolling_number = #{map.planEnrollingNumber},
real_enrolling_number = #{map.realEnrollingNumber},
length_of_schooling = #{map.lengthOfSchooling},
school_fee = #{map.schoolFee},
highest_score = #{map.highestScore},
highest_precedence = #{map.highestPrecedence},
lowest_score = #{map.lowestScore},
lowest_precedence = #{map.lowestPrecedence},
average_score = #{map.averageScore},
average_precedence = #{map.averagePrecedence},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
creator = #{map.creator},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
is_delete = #{map.isDelete},
areaId = #{map.areaId},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_university_major_enrolling ( university_id, major_id, year, batch, admissionBatchId, university_major_type, plan_enrolling_number, real_enrolling_number, length_of_schooling, school_fee, highest_score, highest_precedence, lowest_score, lowest_precedence, average_score, average_precedence, createDate, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, is_delete, areaId ) VALUES ( #{map.universityId}, #{map.majorId}, #{map.year}, #{map.batch}, #{map.admissionBatchId}, #{map.universityMajorType}, #{map.planEnrollingNumber}, #{map.realEnrollingNumber}, #{map.lengthOfSchooling}, #{map.schoolFee}, #{map.highestScore}, #{map.highestPrecedence}, #{map.lowestScore}, #{map.lowestPrecedence}, #{map.averageScore}, #{map.averagePrecedence}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.creator}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.isDelete}, #{map.areaId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
, id
, university_id
, major_id
, year
, batch
, admissionBatchId
, university_major_type
, plan_enrolling_number
, real_enrolling_number
, length_of_schooling
, school_fee
, highest_score
, highest_precedence
, lowest_score
, lowest_precedence
, average_score
, average_precedence
, createDate
, creator
, lastModDate
, lastModifier
, is_delete
, areaId
FROM zgk_university_major_enrolling
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND university_id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.universityId} , '%')
AND major_id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorId} , '%')
AND year like CONCAT('%', #{condition.year} , '%')
AND batch like CONCAT('%', #{condition.batch} , '%')
AND admissionBatchId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.admissionBatchId} , '%')
AND university_major_type like CONCAT('%', #{condition.universityMajorType} , '%')
AND plan_enrolling_number like CONCAT('%', #{condition.planEnrollingNumber} , '%')
AND real_enrolling_number like CONCAT('%', #{condition.realEnrollingNumber} , '%')
AND length_of_schooling like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lengthOfSchooling} , '%')
AND school_fee like CONCAT('%', #{condition.schoolFee} , '%')
AND highest_score like CONCAT('%', #{condition.highestScore} , '%')
AND highest_precedence like CONCAT('%', #{condition.highestPrecedence} , '%')
AND lowest_score like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lowestScore} , '%')
AND lowest_precedence like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lowestPrecedence} , '%')
AND average_score like CONCAT('%', #{condition.averageScore} , '%')
AND average_precedence like CONCAT('%', #{condition.averagePrecedence} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND is_delete like CONCAT('%', #{condition.isDelete} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
